This is bull shit for 2.4 gigs. A: Generous 7 V: 7.5 (Good quality but really grainy)

Good for an earlier release. 

Korean subs aren't that distracting at all.

Video quality is very watchable and better than a typical standard definition DVD rip.

Audio is a bit muffled and you can tell the source isn't as good for it, but the volume is consistent and you get used to it. I've listened to worse MP3's before.

I quite enjoyed it even with how it was. I am not spoiled like some and was on the internet in the age where we'd have to wait 9 hours for a 175MB Xvid file via 56k Dial-Up using shit like Napster. This looked good on my 1080p 42" Plasma.

I do have to say... whoever uploads hardsubbed files in this day and age should be lynched to a tree and beaten like a pinata. If you're going to add subs, at least use softsubs with the Matroska container so we can disable them or demux them.

Video: 8/10.
Audio: 6/10.
Movie: 9/10.
Best copy out as of right now.
